label: Sports Equipment
description: Equipment and accessories for various sports and outdoor activities.

subcategories.label: Bicycles
subcategories.description: Various types of bicycles and accessories.

subcategories.label: Golf Equipment
subcategories.description: Golf clubs, balls, bags, and accessories.

subcategories.label: Swimming and Water Sports
subcategories.description: Swimwear, goggles, and accessories for swimming and other water sports.

subcategories.label: Team Sports
subcategories.description: Equipment and accessories for team sports such as rugby, hockey, and lacrosse.

subcategories.label: Winter Sports
subcategories.description: Equipment and clothing for winter sports such as skiing and snowboarding.

subcategories.label: Other Sports and Outdoor Activities
subcategories.description: Equipment and accessories for various other sports and outdoor activities.
